page.title: 20AMENITIES IN EAST MEON
page.content: The village hall in East Meon is used for such meetings as the over 60's club, the British Legion,a badminton club and is hired out for jumble sales, fetes, wedding receptions,parties and dances.A Spar Shop sells groceries,papers etc.In the Recreation Ground there are swings,a slide, and a climbing frame for children. There is also a cricket pitch.There is a football pitch near the village hall where matches are played almost every Sunday during the Winter.There is a Cub pack of 14 boys. It meets at the school on Tuesday at 5:00pm. A Brownie pack of 26 girls meets on Wednesday at 5:30pm in the school hall.
